name: Dickland: Tower Defense
description:
Dickland: Tower Defense is Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. The main feature of the game is black humor and a visual environment, namely the world of penises. Here you have to build the economy and various defensive towers to resist hordes of enemies.



To do this, you can choose different strategies, such as abandoning the economy to quickly build defenses, building the entire map with simple but cheap towers, or building a few, but very strong and durable upgraded towers.



When the towers can't cope with the hordes of genitals, or some one bespectacled ass was able to slip, then you can use various elemental super-attacks.



In the game you will find many different levels, both in terms of construction and visuals, from steppes and glaciers to real hell! You'll also find yourself in a pleasant but sometimes tense atmosphere, with a cute soundtrack and surrounded by cocks of all shapes and sizes!



Good luck to you, prove to all the sagging and crooked that you are Alpha here!
